entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:58 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
